SEARCH
Package model

Class CardsDeck

java.lang.Object
model.CardsDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CardsDeck extends Object implements Serializable
Class to handle the game's deck of cards. The deck gets filled when the object is constructed, to draw a card, call `draw()`, if it the deck is not empty, it will return an optional containing the drawn card.
See Also:

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CardsDeck()
    Constructor that creates a new deck of cards by initializing a stack of cards with all card values except for empty, and adding 22 instances of each card value to the stack.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardsDeck

      public CardsDeck()
      Constructor that creates a new deck of cards by initializing a stack of cards with all card values except for empty, and adding 22 instances of each card value to the stack. The stack is then shuffled.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public Optional<Card> draw()
      Method that draws a card from the top of the deck. If the deck is empty, returns an empty Optional object; otherwise, returns an Optional object containing the drawn card.
      Returns:
      Optional object containing a drawn card, or empty Optional object if the deck is empty.

    • size

      public int size()
      Method that return the number of cards currently in the deck
      Returns:
      The size of the deck (number of cards)
